named-query.name: findAllEmployeeSalaryRangePositionalParam
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM EmployeeEntity e where e.salary between ?1 and ?2

named-query.name: findEmployeesByNameLikeorderBySalaryDesc
named-query.query: Select e from EmployeeEntity e where e.employeeName like :p1 order by e.salary desc
